name: Blood Connection
description:
We must pump blood through the organs to keep the connections on, we need to keep our person alive for a few more minutes so he can see his family for the last time. Keep an eye on vital organs, we don't want to lose our person.

  • Thifany González

  • Yerlyn Guerrero
